title: Development of Methods for Measuring Student Engagement and Motivation in VR-Based Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: A mathematics learning course using VR simulations in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment. Development of an assessment tool measuring learner engagement and motivation based on Event, Duration, Lag, and Interval (EDLI) metrics

learning_goals: Learners can accurately measure engagement during VR math learning activities at over 80% using the EDLI assessment technique
Learners can identify motivational factors in online learning environments and propose at least three improvement strategies
Learners can record engagement metrics (events/delay times) at least five times during math problem-solving using smartphone-based VR tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
